entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Large value type properties/ref set accessors #63111
  • [DllImportGenerator] Warn/fail when passing by reference a `SafeHandle` without an accessible parameterless constructor. #63109
  • [API Proposal]: RandomNumberGenerator.FillNonZero #63107
  • ReadyToRun executable crashes at Marshal.StructureToPtr when trying to Marshal an Inherited class #63106
  • [API Proposal]: Add Source-Process Property to TcpConnectionInformation #63099
  • The Microsoft.NETCore.App runtime for .NET preview7 is missing when install .NET6 preview7 and 6.0.100 GA at the same time. #63096
  • Linux Docker Container #63094
  • how to collect all assembly references. #63093
  • Problem with Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration and Configuration.GetSection #63091
  • .NET 7 target, .NET 6 docs #63090

Closed

  • Exceptions when serializing log events events in the background #57803
    7.0.0
  • Missing mscordbi.dll 6.0.21.52901 #62990
  • Remove HttpHeaderValueCollection<T>._validator field #63050
  • Remove HttpHeaderValueCollection<T>._specialValue field #63054
  • Release Build using Unsafe.As<List<>> and Sort throws System.ArrayTypeMismatchException in net6.0 #63098
  • Unify semantics of `cpblk` and `initblk` of zero size between Mono and CoreCLR #63038
    7.0.0
  • `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging`'s `ILogger` should support providing a message in a function #59469
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #63112
    area-System.Net
  • Fix setting the configuration parameter in the apple test runner #63102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Address-expose locals under complex local addresses in block morphing #63100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix regex test OOM #63092
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Fixing a possible null reference error in WebSocket deflate. #62716
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.2
  • Reduce size of HttpHeaderValueCollection #63057
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono][interp] Remove null check during initblk/cpblk with size 0 #63086
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove unnecessary assignment of a value to local variables in SPC #63020
    area-System.Runtime
  • Delete some dead code #63087
    community-contribution

Updated

  • JIT: Improve inliner - static readonly fields, pinvokes, Span::Length #62421
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move `System.Drawing.Common` to `SafeHandle`s et. al. #63085
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1525349 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `System.Drawing.Graphics.NativeGraphics`. #63058
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Delete `GT_DYN_BLK` #63026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unused private parameters in SPC #63015
    area-System.Runtime
  • Rewrite XslNumber.ConvertToDecimal #55868
    area-System.Xml, no recent activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Refactoring XmlConvert #60285
    area-System.Xml, no recent activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • LoggingHttpMessageHandler should log unescaped URL in log message (#62894) #63012
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Disable some tests failing on Android x86/arm #63080
    area-System.Collections
  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] add coreclr-libraries directory. #62888
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [mono] Make some icalls return objects using an extra ObjectHandleOnS… #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • macOS dotnet CLI path for global tools is bad - Installer issue #23165
  • `dotnet new console --help` doesn't work starting 6.0.2xx #23162
  • `dotnet run` cannot run the project due to `System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: startIndex cannot be larger than length of string. (Parameter 'startIndex')` exception #23148
  • New CopyLocal item metadata doesn't seem to work on ProjectReferences #23146

Closed

  • msbuild publish fails for runtime target win-x86 #22928
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • fixes dotnet/sdk#23162 dotnet new console --help doesn't work starting 6.0.2xx #23164
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1525148 #23161
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Rename _EnableConsumingManagedCodeFromNativeHosting to EnableNativeHostActivation #23159
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1524945 #23153
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Can't use C# 8.0 using declaration with a discard #2235
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Only Allow Lexical Keywords in the Language #4460

  • Champion "Query-foreach (`do` query termination)" #101

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Source generators cannot use a hint name with valid metadata naming convention characters #58476
  • event handlers are not generated in top level programs. #58474
  • Completion from unimported namespaces doesn't honour implicit usings #58473
  • Array index from end in ValueTuple assignment throws IndexOutOfRangeException #58472
  • IntelliSense not suggesting namespaces after `using` for top-level statements #58470

Closed

  • Naming Rule for Event Handlers #57848
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Support top level statements in event hookup #58475
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Improve support for TestWorkspace with source generated files #58455
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Stack Trace Explorer improvements #58458
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Handle /warnaserror with Warning analyzer bulk configuration in edito… #58460
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor JSInterop Callback to .NET Method fails with dotnet.js: Cannot set properties of undefined in async javascript webgpu context #39173
  • Back action behavior is different in Blazor Server (server-side) and Blazor WebAssembly (client-side) #39172
  • SignalR HubConnection is logging an incorrect Timeout #39171
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results.File() fails to determine the correct file size of symlinks #39170
  • [.NET 6.0] server serve static file without specify any charset in the Content-Type Response Header #39169
  • Blazor analyzer for non-existing property #39167

Closed

  • Perf regression: mvc #39165
  • Very high memory consumption in Blazor app #39156
  • Upgrading from 5.0 to 6.0 yields InvalidOperationException: Cannot find compilation library location for package 'System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs #38892
  • using IClaimsTransformation on-demand #39134
  • a blazor page has many iframe and iframe is also blazor webassembly app #39153
  • Blazor publish cannot access file because it's being compressed multiple times #38429
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: json_netty #39151
  • SignalR connection failed when not on localhost #38976
  • Duplicating Router.AppAssembly in AdditionalAssemblies causes confusing error #38882
    Backlog
  • IHostingStartup implementations not called by ResolveServiceProviderFactory #38977

PullRequests

Created

  • Sync shared code from runtime #39166
    area-runtime
  • Add MIT License Headers to `Components/Web.JS/**/*.ts` Files #39164
    area-blazor
  • Migrate JSInterop to ESLint #39162

Merged

  • Fixup whitespace issues from top-level statement change #39161
    7.0-preview1
  • Ignore identical types when loading routable components #39129
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add EmptyContent to Virtualize #38978
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Grid Column Content Cut Off / Width Incorrect. #3853
  • FlexLayout doesn't size correctly. #3852
  • Additional KeyboardFlags #3851
  • HideKeyboard #3850
  • To enhance CollectionView to expand in both directions #3849
  • FlexLayout doesn't measure out to full height when placed inside ScrollView #3848
  • Run without window on Windows #3846
  • [Bug] iOS: Image isn't shown on the screen if it is added into project as EmbeddedResource #3845
  • [Bug] Android: Elements are clipped incorrectly if Element.Clip is set to EllipseGeometry #3843
  • ContentPage.ToolbarItem not rendering #3842
  • iOS Local Time-Zone Is Set To UTC Only #3839
  • No longer able to click on elements inside Android Inspector because of the NativeGraphicsView #3838

Closed

  • [Bug] Tapgesture not working in iOS and MacCatalyst #3819
  • Consider Right To Left Support and Compatibility for Right To Left Languages #3807

PullRequests

Created

  • Added appsettings.json in configurations #3446 #3844
    area/hosting 🧩

Updated

  • Remove layout resolution #3818
  • Implement RefreshViewHandler on Windows #3299
    area/controls 🎮
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • With .NET 7 SDK, the default tfm is net6.0 not net7.0 for created projects #12892
  • Why hasn't the 7.0.x Runtime installer been updated for over a month? Is it intentional? #12850
